Author: MagiPan
Text: I couldn't sleep and I went downstairs and paced in the living room for 3 hours having fake arguments. Water retention pain left around 7am, and I could finally go to sleep, although I was woken up at 1pm

Author: briohny
Text: Hang in there❤️❤️❤️ It's super painful but it goes away after a while(if this is the retention in the beginning of recovery)? Just try to make yourself as comfortable as possible, take a shower, whatever you need. Take electrolytes, they make you feel less crappy. Try to have a consistent meal pattern although it's so hard. Hope you feel better soon!
